episodes.title: Cult of Mother God and Jehovah's Witnesses Similarities
episodes.description:
A former Jehovah's Witness explains the similarities in history and beliefs of the Jehovah's Witnesses and Amy Carlson's Cult of Mother God, Love has Won.

#exjw #exjwcomedy #jehovahwitness #jehovahswitness #jehovahswitnesses #hbodoc #mothergod #lovehaswon #cult #cults #cultmember #cultexpert #summary #excultmember #colloidalsilver #culthistory #cultbeliefs

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness Religion Began as a Pyramid Scheme
episodes.description: The Jehovah's Witness Religion was initially a publishing company that resembled a pyramid scheme. Members purchased literature and sold it at a profit. They were encouraged to recruit new members and each new member also had to sell literature and subscriptions to literature. If each member did not spend time each month selling literature they were disciplined and labelled 'inactive.' A circuit overseer, or middle-manager, visited each congregation every three months and reviewed how much time the congregation was spending in the publishing work. In the late 90's Watchtower stopped charging money for literature because they were in danger of losing their tax-free-status as a non-profit religion.

episodes.title: How It Feels to be Brainwashed - An EX Jehovah's Witness Explains
episodes.description:
I was a mind controlled Jehovah's Witness for almost 40 years. Using Steven Hassan's Book Combating Cult Mind Control, I examine how it feels to be mind controlled through the eyes of an average Jehovah's Witness. How can you be in a cult and not realize it? I walk you through how it looks and feels.

exjw, Jehovah witness, ex Jehovah's Witness, ex cult member, brain washing, brain washed, mind controlled, Steven Hassan, brain wash, mind control, why I left Jehovah's Witnesses,

episodes.title: Why I Left Jehovah's Witnesses - Former Pioneer
episodes.description:
My experience being a fourth generation Jehovah's Witness and how researching a Watchtower article that didn't sit right with me eventually woke me up. My husband was an elder and I was a pioneer. There was only one thing I knew for sure and that was the truth was the truth so finding out that it wasn't was initially devastating. I'm making this video because I'd like to help people who are having a similar experience as I know how much watching these videos helped me when I was waking up.

exjw ex Jehovah's Witness former pioneer cult two witness rule governing body new light new understanding
